dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'fmMonth DD, YYYY') date_printed, (CASE WHEN sref1.shipment_refnum_value IS NULL THEN s.shipment_xid ELSE sref1.shipment_refnum_value END) invoice_number, TRIM(con.first_name || ' ' || con.last_name) ops_name, con.phone1 ops_phone, con.email_address ops_email FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.INVOICE NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip ON s.shipment_gid = sip.shipment_gid AND sip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.DOCUMENT MANAGER' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con ON sip.involved_party_contact_gid = con.contact_gid WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND :P_RUN = 'FINAL' UNION SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'fmMonth DD, YYYY') date_printed, NVL((CASE WHEN sref1.shipment_refnum_value IS NULL THEN s.shipment_xid ELSE sref1.shipment_refnum_value END), 'Data Missing in System') invoice_number, NVL(TRIM(con.first_name || ' ' || con.last_name), 'Data Missing in System') ops_name, NVL(con.phone1, 'Data Missing in System') ops_phone, NVL(con.email_address, 'Data Missing in System') ops_email FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.INVOICE NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip ON s.shipment_gid = sip.shipment_gid AND sip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.DOCUMENT MANAGER' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con ON sip.involved_party_contact_gid = con.contact_gid WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND :P_RUN = 'DRAFT'

SELECT DISTINCT (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN obrem1.remark_text ELSE NVL(obrem1.remark_text, 'Data Missing in System') END) advising_bank, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN obrem2.remark_text ELSE NVL(obrem2.remark_text, 'Data Missing in System') END) lc_number, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN obrem3.remark_text ELSE NVL(obrem3.remark_text, 'Data Missing in System') END) bank_ref_num FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obrem1 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrem1.order_base_gid AND obrem1.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_ADVISING BANK' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obrem2 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrem2.order_base_gid AND obrem2.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_LETTER OF CREDIT NUM' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obrem3 ON oob.order_base_gid = obrem3.order_base_gid AND obrem3.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_BANK REF' WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND NOT sessuj.s_equipment_gid IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT 'Data Missing in System' advising_bank, 'Data Missing in System' lc_number, 'Data Missing in System' bank_ref_num FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT s.shipment_gid FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND NOT sessuj.s_equipment_gid IS NULL)
